member.name: T:MARC.Everest.Sherpas.Templates.Sandbox.Vocabulary.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Sherpas Generated Vocabulary for Sandbox: EKG Report CDA Document version 2013-02-10T12:52:00

remarks.div:
Sandbox: Electrocardiogram Report as a Minimal CDA Document
This is the sandbox as a playgroup to test ART-DECOR, derived from a minimal CDA Release 2 document based on a real use case of an Electrocardiogram Report of a patient (see The ART-DECOR demo3 example).
Please note that all changes to this project will be overwritten every day at 0300 Coordinated Universal Time UTC

item.description: dr Kai U. Heitmann ()
SIGBOT ()

remarks.div:
A minimal CDA Release 2 document, that contains only a few attributes and relationships for the ClinicalDocument class:
typeId: fixed
id: unique id of the document instance
code: type of document
effectiveTime: creation date of the document
confidentialityCode: confidentiality level indication for this document
recordTarget: the record target (e.g. patient)
author: author of this document
custodian: custodian for this document
component: contains (in this case) structured body

example.code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <v3:ClinicalDocument xmlns:v3="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <v3:typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" extension="POCD_HD000040" /> <v3:templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.3.1937.99.61.3.10.1" /> <v3:id extension="123456789" root="2.16.840.1.113883.3.1937.99.3.2.997788.1" /> <v3:code code="11524-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EKG study report" /> <v3:effectiveTime value="20131020122709" /> <v3:confidentialityCode code="N" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.25" /> <v3:recordTarget /> <v3:author /> <v3:custodian /> <v3:component> <v3:structuredBody> <v3:component /> </v3:structuredBody> </v3:component> </v3:ClinicalDocument>

member.name: T:MARC.Everest.Sherpas.Templates.Sandbox.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Sherpas Generated Classes for Sandbox: EKG Report CDA Document version 2013-02-10T12:52:00

remarks.div:
Sandbox: Electrocardiogram Report as a Minimal CDA Document
This is the sandbox as a playgroup to test ART-DECOR, derived from a minimal CDA Release 2 document based on a real use case of an Electrocardiogram Report of a patient (see The ART-DECOR demo3 example).
Please note that all changes to this project will be overwritten every day at 0300 Coordinated Universal Time UTC

item.description: dr Kai U. Heitmann ()
SIGBOT ()
